issue.title: Implement Arrow Echo server for integration testing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-506](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-506). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be convenient to have an test utility that would run an Arrow echo server that receives over the socket arrow streams and then echoes them back. This would exercise the serialize and deserialize code on the server and the client.
